name: Darkraid: Delilah
description:
Constable Bathory and her team of Enforcers were investigating the notorious Blackblood Gang when things quickly turned south.

The main game: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2002610/Delilah/

Controls: WASD to move, LMB to shoot, RMB for secondary attack, Space to jump, E to use doors and switches, numbers 1-7 or scroll wheel to swap weapons, P for menu.
